column2: Request to Become a Princely State
Build the White Sea - Baltic Sea Canal
Give the Power to the People
We finally managed to take over the region of Chiloe and we can integrate it as a new Chilean state.
We have managed to take the most important points in the northern regions, now we will order them to join the Mexican Empire
We finally took Bogotá, now we can dissolve the viceroyalty of New Granada by annexing it to Gran Colombia
We finally took Maracaibo, now we can annex it to Gran Colombia
We finally managed to crush the Pastusos, now they will pay dearly for having hindered the patriot army for so long....
Today our troops have entered Mexico City, that means that the war against Spain is reaching its final phase and Agustin de Iturbide will lead Mexico in its fight.
The military campaign in the south finally bore fruit and we took the most important points in the area, now we can annex them to the Republic of Chile.
We have defeated the royalists of Barquisimeto, and we can reintegrate this area to Gran Colombia.
We have defeated the royalists at Pichincha, now we can free the Quiteños from the royalist yoke and soon integrate them into Gran Colombia.
We Liberate Ecuador from the spanish rule, now they would be a part of the Gran Colombia.
Compadre, we fucked up that motherfuckers spanish in Guatemala, now we can give fredom to his people, but anyways we will annex them later.
Now that we have the opportunity, we will annex the Central American Republic to our Empire, Mexico will prevail.
Jose de Fabrega, the liberator colonel of Panama, has asked us to join Panama to Gran Colombia, do we accept?
We have taken Lima, the center of power of the viceroyalty of Peru, now we can give Peru freedom, the liberation campaign is coming to an end!
We defeated all of those realist with the leadership of Sucre, they surrender, now we can give freedom to the Republic of Bolivar.... or Alto Peru? in any way the libertadorian campaing ends!
Now that we are independent (even with the dictator of Bolivar) we can recover from the war of independence and form a new future for Peru, we just need to get those damn Colombians out of Alto Peru.
Create The Army of The Three Guarantees

At the end of the Mexican War of Independence, the Army of the Three Guarantees was the name given to the army after the unification of the Spanish troops led by Agustín de Iturbide and the Mexican insurgent troops of Vicente Guerrero, consolidating Mexico's independence from Spain. The decree creating this army appeared in the Plan de Iguala, which stated the three guarantees which it was meant to defend: religion, independence, and unity. Mexico was to be a Catholic empire, independent from Spain, and united against its enemies.
We defeated the Spanish in Ayacucho, now we can finally reintegrate the southtern regions to the new Peruvian Republic.
We took Havanna and defeat the spanish forces in Cuba, now we can integrate the cuban territory to our nation.
We finally defeated the Spanish forces in San Jose, now we can finally integrate the Costa Rican territory to our nation.
We finally defeated the Spanish forces in Managua, now we can finally integrate the Nicaraguan territory to our nation.
We finally defeated the Spanish forces in Filipinas, now we can finally integrate the Filipine territory to our nation.

A portion of the empire has been calling for some time for equal rights with the Hungarian and Austrian population. Some of those in power have sought to take advantage of this, by forming a union of many balkan cultures, a united Danubian empire.
